Hello\n\nMy name is Brownie. I am a goblin. Let me tell you a story of Jupiter Artland.
A long time ago many magical creatures lived here. They were helping and protecting people.
They came from a magical dimention called Minecraft, where everything is almost the same but square.
One day, a terrible flood destroyed Jupiter Artland. Everyone was blamed creatures. Only Brian, one of humans keeped peace. Ever since then everyone trusts only him..
I suspect Brian is hidding something. Help me to find out the truth. Find me next to the Suck to start our adventure. Use the map if you don\'t know the way.\nSee you soon!

This is the map of invisible dimention of Jupiter Artland. Find the way to the next location to find Brownie\'s friends, find out what happened and find the treasure! There is a reward waiting for you.. Good luck !

Hello again, thank you so much for helping me. I need to find out what happened, it\’s important for me and my friends. The magic gold which allows us to travel between dimensions has disappeared. This mission is not easy because the other creatures are scared of humans. With your help we will find out the truth but beware, the truth might be scary.\nWe should start with the Stone house. Something tells me one of my friends is hiding there. Let\’s find out!

The first creature you found with Brownie was Glaistig, who lived in Stone House. When Asked by Brownie, he mentioned seeing Brian and Blue Witch looking for something with shovels. He advised you to ask Cu Sith, who lives near to The Temple of Apollo.
Cu Sith told you that she talked to Brian about Gold. The last time she saw him he was with Cailleach Bheur by In Memory.
Cailleach Bheur helped Brian find gold but she doesn\’t know where he hid it. She thinks you should talk to the Mermaid at Life Mounds.
The Mermaid saw Brian looking for Selkie by the bridge on the other side of Life Mounds.
Selkie thinks you should ask Kelpie by the duck pond.
Kelpie saw Brian sneaking around the Crystal Cave (The Light Pours Out of Me). He thinks Cait Sith had something to do with it.
Cait Sith thinks the gold is somewhere around the Crystal Cave, can you find it?

Oh Hello. Did you think I will just leave the treasure here? Oh no it\’s not that easy! I was watching you. If you think you\’re so clever, find it yourself! Here\’s a clue. The gold is hidden in a dark room full of trees, not far away from the Steadings. Good luck.
